commit.message:
varasm.c (output_constant): Do not abort on VIEW_CONVERT_EXPRs between different sizes.

	* varasm.c (output_constant): Do not abort on VIEW_CONVERT_EXPRs
	between different sizes.

From-SVN: r104368

files.patch:

+	between different sizes.
